byline.contributor: Neil MacFarquhar contributed reporting from Moscow.

abstract: Ukrainian separatists celebrate after taking control of strategic city Debaltseve; victory was accomplished with help of regular Russian troops and in spite of cease-fire agreement, which rebel leaders say only applied to front lines; leaders promise to adhere to truce going forward.
lead_paragraph: A rally for the separatists’ victory in the strategic town of Debaltseve came on Defender of the Fatherland Day, a holiday for veterans dating to Soviet times.

headline.main: Ukraine Rebels Celebrate Their Taking of Debaltseve
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Rebels Celebrate Their Taking of Strategic Town

snippet: A rally for the separatists’ victory in the strategic town of Debaltseve came on Defender of the Fatherland Day, a holiday for veterans dating to Soviet times.
